description: “Aquecimento" dives into Brazil’s widely eclectic and regional Electronic / Baile Funk music scene with Producer/DJ VHOOR.  The show connects the past and present while providing hints to the future, highlighting the bubbling underground community, and providing a platform for a more diverse array of artists to be exposed to a worldwide audience.
title: Aquecimento w/ VHOOR

vhoor-14th-september-2023.title: Aquecimento w/ VHOOR - Weird Baile Special

vhoor-22nd-june-2023.title: Aquecimento w/ VHOOR & DJ RaMeMes (O DESTRUIDOR DO FUNK)
